title: Jalen Hurts GF Bry Burrows rocks ring , sparks engagement rumors
body_text:
Jalen Hurts GF Bry Burrows rocks ring, sparks engagement rumors
Jalen Hurts Sparks Engagement Rumors after Girlfriend Bry Burrows Spotted with Engagement Ring
Although Eagles fans are happy with a week one win, the women who have a crush on Jalen Hurts are feeling betrayed by the betrothal.
Philadelphia Eagles Quarterback Jalen Hurts could be off the market officially, after his girlfriend Bry Burrows was recently spotted with what seems to be a hefty engagement on her ring finger.
[ione_media_gallery src=”https://rnbphilly.com” id=”4796644″ overlay=”true”]
There has been a lot of mixed reactions from the football girlies on social media, some who approve, and others who are simply heartbroken. “I mean congratulations I guess…” posted one X user. “Can she fight ?” commented another social media user.
Neither Jalen Hurts or Bry Burrows have made an official announcement on social media in regards to taking their relationship to the next level. However, we do know that the couple has been together for quite some time so this appears to be a legit. Hopefully we will have confirmation from either half of the couple in the near future.
Who Is Bry Burrows?
Bry Burrows is a 27-year-old software guru and currently works for IBM. The young Sagittarius has a reported net worth of 6 million. Ms.Burrow spent her college days at the University of Alabama where she met her alleged boyfriend, Jalen Hurts. The power couple reportedly started dating prior to Hurts making a transfer to the University of Oklahoma.
[ione_media_gallery id=”1768932″ overlay=”true”]
